`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`// useGeolocation.ts\r
\r
import { useState, useEffect } from "react";\r
import { CurrentLocation } from "../types/types";\r
\r
export const useGeolocation = () => {\r
  const [currentLocation, setCurrentLocation] =\r
    useState <\r
    CurrentLocation >\r
    {\r
      lat: 37.5664056,\r
      lng: 126.9778222,\r
    };\r
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\r
\r
  const getPosition = () => {\r
    setLoading(true);\r
\r
    const success = (location: {\r
      coords: { latitude: number, longitude: number },\r
    }) => {\r
      setCurrentLocation({\r
        lat: location.coords.latitude,\r
        lng: location.coords.longitude,\r
      });\r
      setLoading(false);\r
    };\r
\r
    const error = () => {\r
      setLoading(false);\r
    };\r
\r
    if (navigator.geolocation) {\r
      navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(success, error);\r
    }\r
  };\r
\r
  useEffect(() => {\r
    getPosition();\r
  }, []);\r
\r
  return { currentLocation, loading };\r
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\she34\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-fa5d5ed0-8dcd-4ac3-94e8-592021024c3c.mdx",lineNumber:64,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\she34\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-fa5d5ed0-8dcd-4ac3-94e8-592021024c3c.mdx",lineNumber:64,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\she34\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-fa5d5ed0-8dcd-4ac3-94e8-592021024c3c.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:1},this)}function vr(c={}){let{wrapper:t}=c.components||{};return t?(0,o.jsxDEV)(t,Object.assign({},c,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(Te,c,void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\she34\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-fa5d5ed0-8dcd-4ac3-94e8-592021024c3c.mdx"},this)}),void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\she34\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-fa5d5ed0-8dcd-4ac3-94e8-592021024c3c.mdx"},this):Te(c)}var _r=vr;return hr(pr);})();
